add_library(glew "")
set_target_properties(glew PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE C)
if (MSVC)
    target_include_directories(glew PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/")
    if (CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8)
        target_link_libraries(glew PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Release/x64/glew32s.lib")
    else()
        target_link_libraries(glew PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Release/Win32/glew32s.lib")
    endif()
else()
    find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
    target_include_directories(glew PUBLIC ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIR})
    target_link_libraries(glew PUBLIC ${GLEW_LIBRARIES})
endif()
